TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileIOPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class FileIOPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FileIOPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不再支持部分受信任的代码。Partially trusted code is no longer supported. 此属性在 .NET Core 中不起作用。This attribute has no effect in .NET Core. 使用绝对路径指定文件和目录。Files and directories are specified using absolute paths. 在访问文件时，会在创建或打开文件时执行安全检查。When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened. 除非关闭并重新打开该文件，否则不会再次执行安全检查。The security check is not done again unless the file is closed and reopened. 第一次访问文件时检查权限会将安全检查对应用程序性能的影响降到最低，因为打开文件只发生一次，而读取和写入可以发生多次。Checking permissions when the file is first accessed minimizes the impact of the security check on application performance because opening a file happens only once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 允许的声明的范围取决于所使用的 。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全特性声明的安全信息存储在属性目标的元数据中，由系统在运行时进行访问。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，请使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. > [!CAUTION] > `Unrestricted` 授予对文件系统中所有路径的权限，包括可用于访问单个给定文件的多个路径名。`Unrestricted` grants permission for all paths within a file system, including multiple pathnames that can be used to access a single given file. 若要 对文件的访问，必须将所有可能的路径 `Deny` 到该文件。To access to a file, you must `Deny` all possible paths to the file. 例如，如果 \\\server\share 映射到网络驱动器 X，`Deny` 访问 \\\server\share\file，则必须 `Deny` \\\server\share\file、X:\file 和可用于访问该文件的任何其他路径。For example, if \\\server\share is mapped to the network drive X, to `Deny` access to \\\server\share\file, you must `Deny` \\\server\share\file, X:\file and any other path that you can use to access the file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类请求 ，指示要授予代码的唯一权限。The following code example demonstrates how to request by using the class, indicating the only permission that is to be granted to the code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码具有不受限制的 。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted . 通常会在托管库（Dll）中做出一些要求，以帮助保护方法或类免受潜在的有害代码的影响。You typically make demands in managed libraries (DLLs) to help protect methods or classes from potentially harmful code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

[!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对字符串值所指定的文件或目录的完全访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets full access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 用于完全访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for full access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他属性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为授予对指定目录的完全访问权限。The following code example sets the property to grant full access to the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.

value.span: 值的按位组合，表示所有文件的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置对本地计算机和网络驱动器上的所有文件的允许访问权限。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 可以使用按位 `AND` 运算来确定单个 值。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有本地文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 值的按位组合，它表示所有本地文件的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all local files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地文件是包含在本地计算机上的文件。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 不是通过网络驱动器访问的任何文件都是本地文件。Any files that are not accessed through a network drive are local files. 可以使用按位 `AND` 运算来确定单个 值。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

span.span: Gets or sets append access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 用于追加访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for append access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他属性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为授予对指定目录中文件的 访问权限。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#4)]

member this.ChangeAccessControl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可在其中更改访问控制信息的文件或目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

value.span: 可在其中更改访问控制信息的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置对单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他 特性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表（ACL）描述对给定文件及其属性具有或没有特定操作权限的个人或组。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 更改 ACL 的能力是一项重要的权限，应小心授予。The ability to change an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅由安全系统调用，而不是由应用程序代码调用。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，特性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化格式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 元数据中的声明性安全数据是根据此方法返回的与此属性对应的权限创建的。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

exception.span: 要保护访问安全的文件或目录的路径信息包含无效的字符或通配说明符。

span.span: The path information for a file or directory for which access is to be secured contains invalid characters or wildcard specifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PathDiscovery { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PathDiscovery : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置针对其授予路径发现权限的文件或目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory to which to grant path discovery.

value.span: 文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路径发现控制对路径本身中的信息的访问。Path discovery controls access to the information in the path itself. 这可以保护路径中的敏感信息（如用户名）以及有关路径中显示的目录结构的信息。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure revealed in the path. 此值不授予对路径所指代的文件或文件夹的访问权限。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 出于性能原因， 应仅授予目录，而不是文件。For performance reasons, should be granted only to directories, not to files. 例如，应将 权限授予路径，例如 C:\test 和 C:\test\\，而不是 C:\test\example.txt. 的文件。For example, permission should be granted to paths such as C:\test and C:\test\\, not to files such as C:\test\example.txt. 此属性设置单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他属性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为授予对指定目录中文件的 访问权限。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置对单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他 特性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表（ACL）描述对给定文件及其属性具有或没有特定操作权限的个人或组。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 查看 ACL 的功能是一个重要的权限，应小心授予。The ability to view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置单个文件或目录的 、、和 属性。This property sets the , , , and properties for a single file or directory. 使用其他 特性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. 访问权限仅适用于文件数据;它们不包括访问控制属性 和 。The access rights are for file data only; they do not include the access control properties and . > [!NOTE] > 提供 `get` 访问器用于C#编译器兼容性。The `get` accessor is provided for C# compiler compatibility. C#编译器要求特性属性为可读/写。The C# compiler requires attribute properties to be read/write.
